name: Silver Raven Insignia
desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders - Scout
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
Theirs is the legwork and the tailing of targets. They usually wind up in criminal circles due to poverty or lack of education, but they don't seem to have gotten any richer after choosing a life of crime...

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
Risk-takers who utilize their knowledge of chemistry to mix volatile and flammable brews that aid in their comrades' dastardly deeds.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
They say that some Treasure Hoarder Potioneers used to be charlatans who would wander villages, towns, and cities, hawking their special blends of elixirs, holy waters, and the like. These cure-alls certainly seem to serve better in combat than they ever did in chicanery.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
"Potioneer" is the nickname given to members of the Treasure Hoarder organization who know how to brew up dangerous chemicals.
"What? Did you think this treasure has 'Adventurers' Guild' written all over it or something?"
—A certain Treasure Hoarder Potioneer during a confrontation with adventurers

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
Cryo Potioneers are quite the welcome sight amongst the Treasure Hoarders due to their elixirs having the ability to rapidly cool things down. Even out in the wild where there are no Mist Flowers to be found, they can have some cold liquor to make merry with.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders: Handyman
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
These members do physical work and are lower on the pecking order. They are often laughed at for their physique — but when the gang comes under attack, they get a chance to show their unexpectedly high strength and agility.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders - Marksman
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
Though they are called "marksmen," this name has an undercurrent of mockery to it, as they use crossbows instead of bows, which require a long period of training to use. It must be said that even hilichurls know how to operate a crossbow. Just point the wider end at the enemy, pull the trigger, and bam — that's all there is to it.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
"They say that we stand on the shoulders of giants. That means digging up the accumulated wealth of our forebears, taking them with us, and... uh, returning them to the economic cycle! What a noble endeavor, am I right?"
—A certain Treasure Hoarder Gravedigger, while delving deep into a ruin.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders - Seaman
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
"Stealing? What do you mean, stealing? It's re-discovery, I tell you — the return of treasure to those who appreciate it! Makes everyone happy, to boot! How great is that, eh?"
—A certain Treasure Hoarder Seaman, in response to a question posed by a doubtful recruit

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders - Pugilist
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
Passionate about battle and muscles, they are quite picky about food and will often boast of the benefits of having a fine musculature, leading to some dissatisfaction from their fellow Treasure Hoarders.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders - Crusher
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
This person was originally a miner — one who, even with the allowance they were provided with after the closure of the Chasm, ended up with the Treasure Hoarders for various reasons.

customize.name: Silver Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

customize.name: Masterless Stardust
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Silver Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
customize.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

customize.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
customize.desc: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

customize.name: Shikanoin Heizou
customize.desc: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.

customize.name: Thoma
customize.desc: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

customize.name: Yanfei
customize.desc: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

customize.name: Beidou
customize.desc: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

customize.name: Mitternachts Waltz
customize.desc: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.

customize.name: Prototype Crescent
customize.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

customize.name: Messenger
customize.desc: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

customize.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
customize.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

customize.name: Hunter's Bow
customize.desc: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

customize.name: Ballad of the Boundless Blue
customize.desc: An anthology of exquisite poetry. It contains quite a few poems beloved by Mondstadters, concerning the skies, dandelions, and other such topics.

customize.name: Wine and Song
customize.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

customize.name: Sacrificial Fragments
customize.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

customize.name: Emerald Orb
customize.desc: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."

customize.name: Vortex Vanquisher
customize.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

customize.name: Kitain Cross Spear
customize.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

customize.name: Crescent Pike
customize.desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

customize.name: The Unforged
customize.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

customize.name: Makhaira Aquamarine
customize.desc: An ancient greatsword that gleams like the waters themselves. A thousand years of sand erosion has not dulled its unnaturally sharp edge one bit.

customize.name: Whiteblind
customize.desc: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.

customize.name: Skyrider Greatsword
customize.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.name: Sword of Descension
customize.desc: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.

customize.name: Lion's Roar
customize.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

customize.name: Fillet Blade
customize.desc: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

customize.name: Golden Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Silver Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

customize.name: Prince
customize.desc: Prince is Margaret's cat and is also a Genius Invokation TCG Master at the Cat's Tail Tavern.

customize.name: Silver Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
customize.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

customize.name: Golden Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

value.text:
Crafted
Dropped by Lv. 40+ Treasure Hoarders
Stardust Exchange
